thread.title: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024
thread.title_full: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024

author: VideoElephant
title: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024
text: At the start of the new year, 22 states and 43 cities and counties are increasing the hourly minimum wage, benefiting nearly 10 million people. And that doesn't only affect workers at major fast food chains or retail outlets; it also includes people who work at small, locally-owned businesses. spotlight Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024 - VideoElephant - - [0](https://gazettetimes.com/news/nation-world/government-politics/millions-of-u-s-workers-will-see-a-pay-increase-in-2024/article_1fe04248-35f6-569b-849f-d7d7b1248080.html?mode=comments) Related to this story Most Popular Maine has removed former President Donald Trump from the state’s presidential primary ballot under the Constitution’s insurrection clause in a… [ Supreme Court won’t fast-track ruling on whether Trump can be prosecuted in election subversion case](/news/nation-world/government-politics/donald-trump-capitol-riot-immunity-supreme-court/article_044b61c9-daee-5ac8-9b00-a0958336df63.html) The Supreme Court will not immediately take up a plea to rule on whether former President Donald Trump can be prosecuted for his actions to ov… Michigan's Supreme Court is keeping former President Donald Trump on the state's primary election ballot. Authorities are investigating a Christmas Day swatting call at Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene’s residence in Rome, Georgia. She's been making her way up and down the state as other candidates struggled to gain traction or dropped out of the race entirely.
